WRITING.TITLE: Happy Birthday, Flannery OConnor! Listen to this rare recording of her reading A Good Man is Hard to Find

WRITING.TEXT: I wonder if voter turnout would go down if it was a holiday.

WRITING.TITLE: The Poetry of Richard Milhous Nixon was composed of direct quotes from the Watergate tapes and included poems with titles like I Cant Recall.

WRITING.TEXT: [words are] the wildest, freest most irresponsible most unteachable of all. Of course you can catch them and sort them and place them in alphabetical order in dictionaries but words do not live in dictionaries, they live in the mind
